message: Created comprehensive MCP tools test suite: tests/test_mcp_tools.py with 36 test functions covering all 8 MCP tools. 32/36 tests passing (89% success rate). Tests validate: create_real_task, deploy_headless_agent, get_real_task_status, get_agent_output, kill_real_agent, update_agent_progress, report_agent_finding, spawn_child_agent. Includes edge cases, error conditions, .fn attribute bug fix validation (line 2336). 4 failing tests are complex tmux deployment integrations requiring live subprocess interactions.

key_coverage: Success paths for all 8 MCP tools
Error conditions (task not found, agent not found, limits reached)
Coordination info returned by update_agent_progress and report_agent_finding
JSONL logging of progress and findings
Edge cases (special characters, multiple updates, empty workspaces)
data.failure_reason: Complex tmux deployment integration - requires live subprocess and deep mocking of deployment chain
